results.name: Decimal expansion of sqrt(1 - 1/sqrt(2)), the abscissa of the point of bisection of the arc of the unit lemniscate (x^2 + y^2)^2 = x^2 - y^2 in the first quadrant.
reference: C. L. Siegel, Topics in Complex Function Theory, Volume I: Elliptic Functions and Uniformization Theory, Wiley-Interscience, 1969, page 5
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
xref: Cf. A154743 for the ordinate and A154747 for the radius vector.
Cf. A154740, A154741 and A154742 for the continued fraction and the numerators and denominators of the convergents.
Cf. A085565 for 1.311028777..., the first-quadrant arc length of the unit lemniscate.
results.author: _Stuart Clary_, Jan 14 2009
ext: Offset corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 05 2009
